name: Nike SuperRep Go 2
desc: The Nike SuperRep Go 2 combines lightweight cushioning underfoot and breathable mesh up top to get you moving comfortably in circuit-based fitness classes or while streaming workouts at home. With the supportive arc on the side and extra flexibility in the sole, you're ready to go for 1 more rep.

name: Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT%
desc: The Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT% mixes durability with a design that helps push you towards your personal best. The result is a shoe built like a racer, but made for your everyday training routine.

name: Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT% FlyEase
desc: The ultra-responsive Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT% FlyEase is designed to help you get the most from your training runs, so you can go confidently into your next (or first) race. It has a step-in entry and an internal lacing mechanism you operate with one hand. Pull one loop to tighten, another to release.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 FlyEase
desc: Your workhorse with wings returns. The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor. Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a FlyEase entry system that gets you in quickly and easily.

name: Nike Air Force 1 07 Essential
desc: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Essential, the b-ball OG that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: crisp leather, bold colours and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.

name: Nike Air Max 2090 SE
desc: The Nike Air Max 2090 is a futuristic take on our classic Air Max 90, celebrating 3+ decades since the icon's release. They pay homage with old-school details. Plus, peek into big Air under your feet. Add in colours inspired by sunsets and your next adventure awaits (no matter what time it is).

name: Nike WearAllDay
desc: The Nike WearAllDay means just that: everyday kicks for your kiddos' adventures. It's versatile, durable and comfy—all packed into one shoe for each growing step.

name: Adidas 4D Fusio
desc: Life moves quickly. We can't predict the future, but we can stride toward it confidently. Lace into these running-inspired shoes and start the journey. Their digitally printed adidas 4D midsole is precision crafted with light, oxygen and liquid resin for controlled energy return. An adidas Primeknit upper adds foot-hugging comfort for the ride. The future is now.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
desc: Prototype after prototype. Innovation after innovation. Testing after testing. Meet us in the hot pursuit of the pinnacle harmonization of weight, cushioning, and responsiveness. Ultraboost 21. Say hello to incredible energy return.

name: Adidas NMD R1
desc: If your head is up in the sky, you might as well have something on your feet to match. The Boost cushioning of these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes gives you that feeling of walking on clouds, even if it's really just the city streets. The engineered mesh upper keeps things light and airy. As you're floating through the day, signature midsole plugs keep you grounded in the NMD heritage.

name: Adidas HU NMD
desc: Pairing vibrant colors with words that serve as reminders, musician and designer Pharrell Williams champions our fight for and alongside the community. These shoes rework the iconic NMD silhouette with text that stands out on the adidas Primeknit upper. Boost cushioning provides endless energy return and comfort with every step.

name: Adidas Superstar Mules
desc: Reconstructed. Reimagined. Ever since they first stepped out onto the hardwood in the '70s, adidas Superstar shoes have been synonymous with boundary-breaking attitudes and evolving style. This pair honors that drive for progress with a sleek, slip-on design that keeps you decked out in bold, metallic style (without the need to lace up). So go ahead, slide in and head out. It's as easy as that.

name: Adidas Superstar 360
desc: Your superhero-in-training doesn't have time for fussing around with laces and bows. They've got a world to save. These toddlers' adidas Superstar shoes have a stretchy slip-on build to get them off the changing table fast. Lightweight materials won't weigh them down on any mission they set their minds to.

name: Adidas X Lego Sport
desc: These infants' adidas x LEGO® shoes celebrate years of creativity to come. They give your baby builder something comfortable to stomp around in. They're lace-free, making them easy to slip onto busy feet. The outsole has the unmistakable look of a LEGO® brick. This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials.

name: Puma First Mile Fuse
desc: FUSE goes hard in the gym and easy on the planet. We utilized yarn made from recycled plastic to create shoelaces, lining, and a footbed cover that are 100% recycled poly and lavender materials that are 64%. The overall construction combines stability and functionality with PUMA’s iconic design DNA. With a 4mm drop and a wide toe box, FUSE gives you a stable stance while the internal midsole provides shock absorption for heavily weighted workouts. To kick it up a notch, a TPU heel clip offers a boost of support and durable PUMAGRIP provides all-purpose traction for maximum grip during quick agility movements. The abrasion-resistant mesh upper allows for flexibility while also protecting you from wear and tear movements like rope climbs. It’s a shoe that doesn’t shy away from a workout or its responsibility to the planet.

name: Puma UltraRide Runner ID
desc: Sometimes to reach extraordinary places, you have to remove excess boundaries. Built on the foundation of Reductionist Theory, UltraRide removes the limits with outsole cutaways to leave you with one basic running essential: cushioning and responsiveness for limitless potential. A light upper and supportive midsole plate merge through a dynamic bridge design. With reflective Runner ID technology for night visibility, combined with PROFOAMLITE cushioning and rubber surface for power at toe-off, UltraRide carries you to great.

name: Puma Cruise Rider
desc: Introducing the Cruise Rider. This playful kick is a step above the rest with fun colorblocking, a dynamic material mix, and a stacked outsole.

name: Puma Velocity NITRO
desc: Velocity NITRO doesn’t pick favorites. Made for any distance, this anywhere, everywhere running shoe was made with NITRO foam for superior responsiveness and ultimate cushioning. A secure fit and a breathable, engineered mesh upper offer a comfortable ride for every run. To complete the package, a PUMAGRIP rubber outsole offers supreme traction for all surfaces and conditions.

name: Puma Future Rider Neon
desc: Back in 1980, the Fast Rider was one of PUMA’s most comfortable yet simplistic running shoes, with a super-light design and shock-absorbing outsole. Today, PUMA has revamped the Fast Rider as the Future Rider. Featuring vibrant colors and a comfortable feel, this is the perfect shoe for your little one's feet.

name: Under Armour UA HOVR Infinite 3
desc: Pro distance runners want energy return and efficiency. And that's exactly what UA HOVR™ Infinite 3 delivers. That and real-time Form Coaching. Connect your shoes to UA MapMyRun™ for personalized tips to help you run better.

name: Under Armour Project Rock 2
desc: Project Rock training gear was built to help you find boundaries, then push right through them. These stability gym shoes, like everything in this collection was approved by Dwayne Johnson, the hardest worker in any room.

name: Under Armour Charged Aurora
desc: These were designed from the ground up for female athletes, with the right cushioning and support for a woman's center of gravity and foot-shape. They're also super-light and breathable, perfect for HIIT or bootcamp.

name: Under Armour Curry 7
desc: Stephen went from a 3-star recruit to a 3x world champion because he's focused and knows how to control the court. This shoe was built for his style of play—it responds quick, keeps you stable, and lets you cover more ground.
